name: Purple Cheese
description: Purple Cheese is an indica-dominant autoflowering hybrid that combines Purple #1, Blue Cheese, and Lowryder. Bred by Auto Seeds, Purple Cheese was designed to have a sweeter, less cheesy flavor than its Blue Cheese parent. It does, however, inherit a tight bud structure and a high CBD profile. With a palatable fruit aroma, Purple Cheese delivers powerful full-body effects best suited for night owls or patients treating pain. Colder climates will bring out this hybrid's purple hues, and for best results, growers should keep this autoflowering variety between 50-80 cm in height.
descriptionPlain: Purple Cheese is an indica-dominant autoflowering hybrid that combines Purple #1, Blue Cheese, and Lowryder. Bred by Auto Seeds, Purple Cheese was designed to have a sweeter, less cheesy flavor than its Blue Cheese parent. It does, however, inherit a tight bud structure and a high CBD profile. With a palatable fruit aroma, Purple Cheese delivers powerful full-body effects best suited for night owls or patients treating pain. Colder climates will bring out this hybrid's purple hues, and for best results, growers should keep this autoflowering variety between 50-80 cm in height.

highlightedReviews.text: Super stony. Good sedating, but don't expect to do shit. Seriously. This is night time weed. A highbred, but hits like a full Indica with steam behind it. Girlfriend had nasty monthly cramps and now she is singing Prince songs and dancing (there's no music playing). Good stuff.

I have yet to give a perfect rating but Purple Cheese comes pretty close. I just smoked a 3 gram blunt (Fronto tobacco leaf wrap) and it is a joy to taste and smell. So much so that I will pop some in the Pax 3 later, even though I rarely use it for flower anymore.  One definitely notices some heavy body effects, perhaps due to the higher CBD content?  Regardless, this is an exotic strain for the connoisseur! I would call this pretty close to 50/50 Hybrid, perhaps a bit more Indica. The buds are very well manicured with lots of caramel colored hairs throughout. Lots of crystals, cheesy smell but it’s not like Blue Cheese, it’s more mellow and less funky. Quite an herbal flavor, with a nice nutty finish. Pick it up if you can...4.75 stars.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Drizella, Star Berry Indica, Big Sur Holy Bud, Dream Police, and Purple Cheese
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Thanks to all the Leafly users who submitted strain nominations this week! Our strain database now exceeds 1,000 varieties, but our collection is far from finished so keep the suggestions coming. Drizella, Star Berry Indica, Big Sur Holy Bud, Dream Police, and Purple Cheese are only a few among many newly added varieties, so don't forget to check out all of the other newcomers in the strain Explorer!
   1. Drizella
Characteristics of Drizella:

Mostly sativa
Cross between Cinderella 99, White Widow, and Space Queen
Breeder: Dynasty Seeds
Tropical pineapple, citrus, and vanilla aroma
Clear, stimulating cerebral effects
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   2. Star Berry Indica
Characteristics of Star Berry Indica:

Mostly indica
Cross between Sensi Star and Blueberry
Breeder: CannaVenture
Lemon and berry aroma
Heavy, relaxing effects
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

 
   3. Dream Police
Characteristics of Dream Police:

Balanced hybrid
Cross between AK-47 and Dreamy Bubbles
Breeder: Crazy Diamonds
Spicy and sweet floral aroma
May help ease pain and stress
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   4. Big Sur Holy Bud
Characteristics of Big Sur Holy Bud:

Mostly sativa
Unknown lineage
Breeder: Bodhi Seeds
Blueberry, menthol aroma
Uplifting cerebral effects

   5. Purple Cheese
Characteristics of Purple Cheese:

Indica-dominant autoflowering hybrid
Cross between Purple #1, Blue Cheese, and Lowryder
Breeder: Auto Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Can exhibit a high CBD content
Powerful full-body relief
